text:
1. What’s Ray’s problem? Why is he so unhappy? 
 Ray is unhappy because he lives in conflict with his 
 . He feels disconnected from his Higher Self.
2. True or False: The Sun is controlling, overbearing and robs Ray of the freedom to be himself.
3. True or False: We are all rays of the Sun. He is the Soul of our soul. We exist as a part of Him; not apart from Him.

4. According to Doc, rays of light are more wholly [completely] themselves when they are in service of the Sun. Why? 
 True or False: Because we are simply being who we are. All the Sun really asks of us is to be ourselves.
